TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Validation extends System.Object
public ref class Validation abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供支援資料驗證的方法和附加屬性。

span.span: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

summary.span: 從指定的 物件中移除所有 物件。

span.span: Removes all objects from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bindingExpression`物件可能已從無效呼叫或先前失敗的驗證。The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a call or a previously failed validation. 在這個呼叫之後，物件是有效的。The object is valid after this call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件維持無效直到稱為或另一個傳輸繫結來源的驗證成功。The object stays invalid until is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
